title: Can You Get Apple TV on Chromecast? Easy Alternative Methods

steps.title: Go to https://tv.apple.com/ in Google Chrome.
steps.content: Go to https://tv.apple.com/ in Google Chrome . Since the Apple TV app isn't supported by Chromecast alone, you can cast the website from the Chrome desktop browser.

steps.title: Navigate to a show or movie.
steps.content: Navigate to a show or movie. If you aren't already logged in to Apple TV, do so now. Use the search bar to find something specific or browse your homepage.

steps.title: Click ⋮.
steps.content: Click ⋮ . This is in the top-right corner. A pop-up menu will open.

steps.title: Hover over Save and share.
steps.content: Hover over Save and share . This is towards the bottom of the menu.

steps.title: Click Cast….
steps.content: Click Cast… . This is at the bottom of the menu.

steps.title: Click your device.
steps.content: Click your device. On the Cast tab, you'll see a list of all active and compatible devices. Select your device to start casting. If you don't see your device, make sure it's on the same network as your computer or laptop. The Apple TV tab will be casted to your Chromecast or Smart TV.

steps.title: Set up Chromecast with Google TV.
steps.content: Set up Chromecast with Google TV. Chromecast with Google TV operates similarly to an Amazon Fire Stick , Roku, or other streaming device. You can install the Apple TV app on your Chromecast with Google TV to watch your favorite Apple TV shows and movies. [1] X Research source

steps.title: Select Apps.
steps.content: Select Apps . This is the tab at the top. [2] X Research source

steps.title: Select Search.
steps.content: Select Search . This is next to the magnifying glass icon.

steps.title: Type apple tv and search.
steps.content: Type apple tv and search. Use the on-screen keyboard.

steps.title: Select Install.
steps.content: Select Install . The app will begin downloading. This may take a few moments.

steps.title: Select Open.
steps.content: Select Open . Apple TV will launch. You'll be prompted to enter your login information before you can start watching.

steps.title: Use AirPlay.
steps.content: Use AirPlay. If you can't cast to a Chromecast, consider using AirPlay instead. This will allow you to cast directly to the Smart TV instead.

steps.title: Check your internet connection.
steps.content: Check your internet connection. Make sure your Chromecast device and casting device are connected to the same Wi-Fi network . This is how your device is recognized. If needed, restart your network .

steps.title: Apple TV is not supported on Chromecast.
steps.content: Apple TV is not supported on Chromecast. There are workarounds, such as using Google's separate streaming device (Chromecast with Google TV). You can also stream using Google Chrome on your desktop. When it comes to Apple mobile apps, you can only use AirPlay.
